questions.question_text: The Snowflake Search Optimization Services supports improved performance of which kind of query?

choices.D: Queries against a subset of columns in a table
choices.B: Queries against tables larger than 1 TB
choices.A: Queries against large tables where frequent DML occurs

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Selective point lookup queries

Selected Answer: C
keyword: selective

Selected Answer: C
Correct

Selected Answer: C

Selected Answer: BE
BE are correct

Any valid delimiter is supported; default is comma (i.e. CSV).
JSON
Parquet

correct
